A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a life long Star Wars fan\, the last Jedi is awful. Luke Skywalker was the new hope and he would have never turned his back on what he cares about. He did not strike his father down because he had hope. For him to be hopeless\, is just stupid. Also\, Anakin was the chosen one and now members of his blood line are so weak in the force that they can't defeat a noob? I call b.s. It really kills the idea the the Skywalker blood line even matters. I'm not planning on seeing episode 9.
